name: Nightmare After The Fall
description:
It's the night after the big event and Mak isn't sleeping well.

Haunted by the silliness of his slip, he can't stop seeing visions of the event in his dreams - however abstract those visions have now become.

Guide Mak through the challenge in his mind, and earn an epic score by collecting SGJ tokens to set him free from his torment.

Use W,A,S,D to move and dodge the Laparitions. Hit space once you get to the 'Fail Zone' and please the crowd with your epic fail. Performing your fail outside of the Fail Zone will cause Mak's laptop and hard work to be lost forever. Make sure you score high enough to save it!
